question: 対向する
sourceAnswer: To Counter, To Be Oncoming, To Come Towards
activeAnswer: To Counter, To Be Oncoming, To Come Towards
sourceMnemonic: We are <kanji>versus</kanji> <kanji>yonder</kanji> (that side). We need to switch things around on that side, and we need <vocabulary>to counter</vocabulary> them now that it's our turn.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
